kizuna_language_c_02:
Thanks to your advice from before, Pawmi is...
Well, just see for yourself![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_03:
Hmm...yeah. It’s feeling better, but this particular
Pawmi may just be a bit meek, I suppose?[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_ecology_01:
I had Nurse Miriam take a look as well, and she
says there’s nothing wrong with it healthwise![VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_language_c_ecology_02:
So it shouldn’t have any injuries, ailments, or
the like.[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_language_c_04:
Even so, it never utters so much as a cry, which
is odd.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_05: That part has even Mr. Jacq here stumped.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_ecology_03: Sorry that I couldn’t be of any help...[VAR 0114(002A)]
kizuna_language_c_06: Ne t’inquiète pas! Don’t worry about it![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_07:
I have some more information now thanks to the
academy’s security cameras, though.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_08:
It seems Pawmi was attacked by a wild Pokémon
and fled here to the academy grounds.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_09:
Maybe it’s still in a bit of shock from that
experience and can’t bring itself to speak yet?[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_10:
Yep! If that’s the case, there’s absolutely no
problem with keeping quiet! Pas de problème![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_11:
We can just attendre—wait, that is—until it feels
like talking! That’s all we can do, really![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_12:
Even if you can speak all sorts of languages,
there’s no guarantee that you can understand\r
what’s going on in someone’s heart.[VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_13:
But have no fear! I won’t give up! No—I’ll keep
on trying until we’ve figured each other out![VAR 0114(0026)]
kizuna_language_c_system_01: You feel trusted by Mr. Salvatore!
